DOC.brief_summary: Many cancer survivor experience treatment-related impairment mental ability memory , attention , concentration ( know cognition ) . Research indicate physical activity improve cognition healthy adult ; however , little known whether physical activity improve cognition among cancer survivor . This study test whether physical activity intervention result improvement cognition among breast cancer survivor , may lead intervention improve cognition .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Neuropsychological Outcomes Cancer Population
